result.name: Sample: Assign IT service management skipped records to admin
result.comment: Sample rule that assigns IT service management skipped records to the example user System Admin automatically

result.name: SNC: Auto-retain pa_dashboards records
result.comment: The rule automatically sets the generated skipped records for pa_dashboards table to "Keep My Modifications (Always Retain)". This table is generally used for configuration changes and does not need to be reviewed.
